name: BlastCasta
tag_list: rss, atom, feed-processing, feed-tools, feed-landing-page, api, add-fresh-content, add-news-ticker, mashup
overview:
BlastCasta’s main goal is to promote RSS and Atom feed usage by providing a number of content feed tools to publishers, developers, and readers. Users of BlastCasta’s services can customize feeds, add feed content to their websites, and use customized feeds directly in their applications by calling the BlastCasta API.

BlastCasta allows any user to combine, filter, sort, convert format, and translate feeds between different languages. Feed publishers can create custom feed-landing pages for their feeds that allow readers to subscribe and use most of the BlastCasta services on a feed in one place. In this way, the BlastCasta feed-landing page helps readers gain an appreciation for the power of content feeds. As an example, readers that view a feed-landing page for a particular feed can get a translated version of the feed on-the-fly with just a few clicks, and can then subscribe to it or add the content to one of their websites, which could help the feed publisher gain international visitors.

BlastCasta also provides a feed-creation service to users so they can easily generate their own feeds from scratch and also use the BlastCasta services on their feeds.
